1color-light.description: Single color (neutral) logo for light backgrounds
1color-light.guidance: Professional and clean - won't compete with colorful design elements

1color-dark.description: Single color (neutral) logo for dark backgrounds
1color-dark.guidance: Professional and clean - won't compete with colorful design elements

2color-light.description: Two color (neutral + green) logo for light backgrounds
2color-light.guidance: Most recognizable CIQ branding - use when logo is the star of the design

2color-dark.description: Two color (neutral + green) logo for dark backgrounds
2color-dark.guidance: Most recognizable CIQ branding - use when logo is the star of the design

green-light.description: Single color (green) logo for light backgrounds
green-light.guidance: Use in neutral/minimal designs when you need the logo to jump out

green-dark.description: Single color (green) logo for dark backgrounds
green-dark.guidance: Use in neutral/minimal designs when you need the logo to jump out

icon-blk-light.description: Fuzzball icon (black) for light backgrounds - Large
icon-blk-light.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

icon-blk-medium.description: Fuzzball icon (black) for light backgrounds - Medium
icon-blk-medium.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

icon-blk-small.description: Fuzzball icon (black) for light backgrounds - Small
icon-blk-small.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

icon-wht-light.description: Fuzzball icon (white) for dark backgrounds - Large
icon-wht-light.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

icon-wht-medium.description: Fuzzball icon (white) for dark backgrounds - Medium
icon-wht-medium.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

icon-wht-small.description: Fuzzball icon (white) for dark backgrounds - Small
icon-wht-small.guidance: Perfect for tight spaces where you need just the Fuzzball symbol

horizontal-blk-large.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (black) for light backgrounds - Large
horizontal-blk-large.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

horizontal-blk-medium.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (black) for light backgrounds - Medium
horizontal-blk-medium.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

horizontal-blk-small.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (black) for light backgrounds - Small
horizontal-blk-small.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

horizontal-wht-large.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Large
horizontal-wht-large.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

horizontal-wht-medium.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Medium
horizontal-wht-medium.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

horizontal-wht-small.description: Fuzzball horizontal logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Small
horizontal-wht-small.guidance: Best for wide spaces - business cards, website headers, email signatures

vertical-blk-large.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (black) for light backgrounds - Large
vertical-blk-large.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

vertical-blk-medium.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (black) for light backgrounds - Medium
vertical-blk-medium.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

vertical-blk-small.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (black) for light backgrounds - Small
vertical-blk-small.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

vertical-wht-large.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Large
vertical-wht-large.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

vertical-wht-medium.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Medium
vertical-wht-medium.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

vertical-wht-small.description: Fuzzball vertical logo (white) for dark backgrounds - Small
vertical-wht-small.guidance: Perfect for tall/narrow spaces - social media profiles, mobile layouts

brand_guidelines.clear_space: Equal to 1/4 the height of the 'Q' in the logo

main_element.description: Logo is the hero/star of the design

supporting_element.alternative: green (for neutral designs where logo needs to pop)

icon.when_to_use: Space is very limited or you need just the recognizable symbol

horizontal.when_to_use: Wide spaces, professional documents, primary branding
